title: HELP HOW CAN I DOWNLOAD LOL IN CHINA ON MAC?!?!?!??!?
body:
im trying to find ways to find a download link but most of it doesnt work because it only supports windows..... 
help me pls im dying ;-;

replies.body: I'm not sure if you're on the right website or not, but this link (http://lol.qq.com/main.shtml) should get you in the right direction. If you need any more help, you'll need to contact Tencent's support since their client operates on different servers (they are essentially 100% separate from NA).
